title: Paint an Aircraft
description: A team in a paint hangar must paint a newly assembled aircraft according to the customer's livery specifications.

tasks.description: Mask all areas of the aircraft that should not be painted, such as windows, antennas, and landing gear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all sensitive areas are correctly masked.

tasks.description: Apply the primer and multiple coats of paint, following the specifications for paint type and thickness.
Apply the customer's decals and logos, and perform a final quality inspection of the paint job.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies the livery and confirms the finish meets quality standards.
